allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Markdown extraction with column detection for PDF itineraries

- Add ExtractAsMarkdown\(\) method to PdfPagePropertiesService
- Add column detection to filter out sidebar content in two-column PDFs
- Add /extract-markdown API endpoint
- Add marked library for Markdown-to-HTML conversion in frontend
- Update modal to use new Markdown extraction endpoint
- Extract Day N headings as ## and body text as paragraphs
- Stop extraction at footer/disclaimer patterns

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
